message: If you could choose one person to fight hordes of zombies with who would it be, which primary and secondary weapons would you have, and what song would be playing as you fight the relentless horde?
oh man, this is really hard! this is like a 4-part question! i have to think about this one..
@diq, any and all guns @diq has lying around, wu tang da mystery of chessboxin'
Wingman: Gordon Freeman (because he's good with obstacles and crazy situations); Primary Weapon: Megatron in pistol mode; Secondary Weapon: Samurai Sword; Music: Europe - The Final Countdown.

I would fight with my brother because he's smart, quick thinking and is like a planes little black box. He always survives. Primary-machine gun. Secondary- sword. Music playing. REM the end of the world
